gallery_slide.gallery_image_caption: An exhibition of CENTER award winners at the Center for Contemporary Arts Santa Fe (CCA), June 2014. CENTER’s executive director, Laura Pressley, believes W.A.G.E. Certification will signal to photographers interested in working with CENTER “that we are mission-based and not profit-driven.”

An exhibition of CENTER award winners at the Center for Contemporary Arts Santa Fe (CCA), June 2014. CENTER’s executive director, Laura Pressley, believes W.A.G.E. Certification will signal to photographers interested in working with CENTER “that we are mission-based and not profit-driven.”

A 2014 exhibition of CENTER award winners at Colorado Photographic Art Center (CPAC). W.A.G.E. Certification requires minimum artist fees for solo shows, two and three-person shows, and group exhibitions, among other categories.
